solution_line_template: On a weekday, the shop produces {cups_per_hour_weekday} coffee cups per hour * {hours_per_day} hours per weekday = <<{cups_per_hour_weekday}*{hours_per_day}={cups_per_weekday}>>{cups_per_weekday} coffee cups.

The coffee shop therefore brewed {cups_per_weekday} coffee cups per day * {weekdays_per_week} weekdays in a week = <<{cups_per_weekday}*{weekdays_per_week}={total_weekday_cups}>>{total_weekday_cups} coffee cups.

So in total, the coffee shop brewed a total of {total_weekday_cups} weekday coffee cups + {weekend_cups} weekend coffee cups = <<{total_weekday_cups}+{weekend_cups}={total_week_cups}>>{total_week_cups} coffee cups in 1 week.
